Old Testament.name: Work and Glory of God
Old Testament.passage: This is my work and my glory—to bring to pass the immortality and eternal life of man.

Old Testament.name: Zion
Old Testament.passage: The Lord called his people Zion, because they were of one heart and one mind.

Old Testament.name: Abrahamic Covenant
Old Testament.passage: The Lord promised Abraham that his seed would 'bear this ministry and Priesthood unto all nations.'

Old Testament.name: Pre-Mortal Existence
Old Testament.passage: As spirits we 'were organized before the world was.'

Old Testament.name: Creation of Man
Old Testament.passage: God created man in his own image.

Old Testament.name: Marriage
Old Testament.passage: A man ... shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one.

Old Testament.name: Fidelity
Old Testament.passage: How then can I do this great wickedness, and sin against God?

Old Testament.name: The Ten Commandments
Old Testament.passage: The Ten Commandments

Old Testament.name: Choose to Serve God
Old Testament.passage: Choose you this day whom ye will serve.

Old Testament.name: Clean Hands and Pure Heart
Old Testament.passage: Who shall stand in his holy place? He that hath clean hands, and a pure heart.

Old Testament.name: Trust in the Lord
Old Testament.passage: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart … and he shall direct thy paths.

Old Testament.name: Sins Made White
Old Testament.passage: Though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow.

Old Testament.name: Woe to Those Who Distort Good and Evil
Old Testament.passage: Woe unto them that call evil good, and good evil.

Old Testament.name: Restoration of the Gospel
Old Testament.passage: The restoration of the gospel is 'a marvellous work and a wonder.'

Old Testament.name: Christ’s Atonement
Old Testament.passage: Surely [Jesus Christ] hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows.

Old Testament.name: Blessings of a Proper Fast
Old Testament.passage: The blessings of a proper fast

Old Testament.name: Sabbath Day
Old Testament.passage: Turn away ... from doing thy pleasure on my holy day; and call the sabbath a delight.

Old Testament.name: Foreordination
Old Testament.passage: Before I formed thee in the belly ... I ordained thee a prophet unto the nations.

Old Testament.name: The Prophet as a Watchman
Old Testament.passage: The prophet is 'a watchman unto the house of Israel.'

Old Testament.name: Bible and Book of Mormon
Old Testament.passage: The Bible and the Book of Mormon 'shall become one in thine hand.'

Old Testament.name: God’s Kingdom
Old Testament.passage: God shall 'set up a kingdom, which shall never be destroyed.'

Old Testament.name: God Reveals Secrets to Prophets
Old Testament.passage: The Lord God ... revealeth his secret unto his servants the prophets.

Old Testament.name: Blessings of Tithing
Old Testament.passage: The blessings of paying tithing

Old Testament.name: Elijah to Turn Hearts
Old Testament.passage: Elijah 'shall turn … the heart of the children to their fathers.'

New Testament.name: Light Shine
New Testament.passage: Let your light so shine before men.
New Testament.fullPassage: 14 Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid. 15 Neither do men light a candle, and put it under a bushel, but on a candlestick; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house. 16 Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

New Testament.name: Rest in Christ
New Testament.passage: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
New Testament.fullPassage: 28 ¶ Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. 30 For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.

New Testament.name: Keys of the Kingdom
New Testament.passage: Jesus said, 'I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom.'
New Testament.fullPassage: 15 He saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am? 16 And Simon Peter answered and said, Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God. 17 And Jesus answered and said unto him, Blessed art thou, Simon Bar-jona: for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee, but my Father which is in heaven. 18 And I say also unto thee, That thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it. 19 And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.

New Testament.name: Love God and Neighbor
New Testament.passage: Thou shalt love the Lord thy God. … Thou shalt love thy neighbour.
New Testament.fullPassage: 36 Master, which is the great commandment in the law? 37 Jesus said unto him, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind. 38 This is the first and great commandment. 39 And the second is like unto it, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

New Testament.name: Christ's Birth
New Testament.passage: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord.

New Testament.name: Sacrament Remembrance
New Testament.passage: Jesus Christ commanded, partake of the sacrament 'in remembrance of me.'
New Testament.fullPassage: 10 And the angel said unto them, Fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy, which shall be to all people.    11 For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord.    12 And this shall be a sign unto you; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes, lying in a manger.

New Testament.name: Christ's Resurrected Body
New Testament.passage: For a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.
New Testament.fullPassage: 19 ¶ And he took bread, and gave thanks, and brake it, and gave unto them, saying, This is my body which is given for you: this do in remembrance of me. 20 Likewise also the cup after supper, saying, This cup is the new testament in my blood, which is shed for you.

New Testament.name: Born of Water and Spirit
New Testament.passage: Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.
New Testament.fullPassage: 5 Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.

New Testament.name: God's Love
New Testament.passage: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son.
New Testament.fullPassage: 16 ¶ For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

New Testament.name: Knowing Doctrine
New Testament.passage: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine.
New Testament.fullPassage: 17 If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.

New Testament.name: Keep Commandments, love
New Testament.passage: If ye love me, keep my commandments.
New Testament.fullPassage: if ye love me, keep my commandments.

New Testament.name: Ordained and Chosen
New Testament.passage: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you.
New Testament.fullPassage: Ye have not chosen me, but I chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.

New Testament.name: Life Eternal
New Testament.passage: And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ.
New Testament.fullPassage: 3 And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.

New Testament.name: Restitution of All Things
New Testament.passage: Times of restitution of all things, which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets.
New Testament.fullPassage: Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the dpresence of the Lord; And he shall send aJesus Christ, which before was preached unto you: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of arestitution of all things, which God hath bspoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began.

New Testament.name: Know God by the Spirit
New Testament.passage: The Spirit … searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.
New Testament.fullPassage: That your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God. But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him. But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God. For what man knoweth the things of a man, save the spirit of man which is in him? even so the things of God knoweth no man, but the Spirit of God.

New Testament.name: Body as a Temple
New Testament.passage: Your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost.
New Testament.fullPassage: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own?    20 For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God’s.

New Testament.name: Man and Woman
New Testament.passage: Neither is the man without the woman, neither the woman without the man, in the Lord.
New Testament.fullPassage: 11 Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman, neither the woman without the man, in the Lord.

New Testament.name: Resurrection
New Testament.passage: As in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.
New Testament.fullPassage: 20 But now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept.    21 For since by man came death, by man came also the resurrection of the dead.    22 For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.

New Testament.name: Degrees of Glory
New Testament.passage: In the Resurrection, there are three degrees of glory.
New Testament.fullPassage: 40 There are also celestial bodies, and bodies terrestrial: but the glory of the celestial is one, and the glory of the terrestrial is another.    41 There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars: for one star differeth from another star in glory.    42 So also is the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption:

New Testament.name: Gathering in Christ
New Testament.passage: In the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ.
New Testament.fullPassage: 10 That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; even in him:

New Testament.name: Church Foundation
New Testament.passage: The Church is 'built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone.'
New Testament.fullPassage: 19 Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;   20 And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone;

New Testament.name: Apostles and Prophets perfect saints
New Testament.passage: He gave some apostels and prophets for the perfecting of the saints
New Testament.fullPassage: TODO

New Testament.name: Falling Away
New Testament.passage: The day of Christ … shall not come, except there come a falling away first.
New Testament.fullPassage: 1 Now we beseec you, brethren, by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and by our gathering together unto him,    2 That ye be not soon shaken i mind, or be troubled, neither by spirit, nor by word, nor by letter as from us, as that the day of Christ is at hand.    3 Let no man deceive you by an means: for that day shall not come, except there come a falling away first, and that man of sin be revealed, the son of perdition;

New Testament.name: Scriptures for Salvation
New Testament.passage: The holy scriptures … are able to make thee wise unto salvation.
New Testament.fullPassage: 15 And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.    16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:    17 That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.

New Testament.name: Father of Spirits
New Testament.passage: Heavenly Father is 'the Father of spirits.'
New Testament.fullPassage: 9 Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us, and we gave them reverence: shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits, and live?

New Testament.name: Ask for Wisdom
New Testament.passage: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God.
New Testament.fullPassage: 5 If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.    6 But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.

New Testament.name: Faith and Works
New Testament.passage: Faith, if it hath not works, is dead.
New Testament.fullPassage: 17 Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.    18 Yea, a man may say, Thou hast faith, and I have works: shew me thy faith without thy works, and I will shew thee my faith by my works.

New Testament.name: Gospel Preached to the Dead
New Testament.passage: The gospel [was] preached also to them that are dead.
New Testament.fullPassage: 6 For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead, that they might be judged according to men in the flesh, but live according to God in the spirit.

New Testament.name: Judgment by Works
New Testament.passage: And the dead were judged … according to their works.
New Testament.fullPassage: 12 And I saw the dead, small and great, stand before God; and the books were opened: and another book was opened, which is the book of life: and the dead were judged out of those things which were written in the books, according to their works.

Book of Mormon.name: Obedience to Commandments
Book of Mormon.passage: I will go and do the things which the Lord hath commanded.

Book of Mormon.name: Purpose of Life
Book of Mormon.passage: Adam fell that men might be; and men are, that they might have joy.

Book of Mormon.name: Freedom to Choose
Book of Mormon.passage: They are free to choose liberty and eternal life … or … captivity and death.

Book of Mormon.name: Equality before God
Book of Mormon.passage: All are alike unto God.

Book of Mormon.name: Revelation
Book of Mormon.passage: God will give unto the children of men line upon line, precept upon precept.

Book of Mormon.name: Feasting on the Word
Book of Mormon.passage: Feast upon the words of Christ; for behold, the words of Christ will tell you all things what ye should do.

Book of Mormon.name: Necessity of Prayer
Book of Mormon.passage: Ye must pray always.

Book of Mormon.name: Service to Others
Book of Mormon.passage: When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.

Book of Mormon.name: Blessings through Obedience
Book of Mormon.passage: Those that keep the commandments of God … are blessed in all things.

Book of Mormon.name: Overcoming the Natural Man
Book of Mormon.passage: [Put] off the natural man and [become] a saint through the atonement of Christ the Lord.

Book of Mormon.name: Belief in God's Wisdom
Book of Mormon.passage: Believe in God; … believe that he has all wisdom.

Book of Mormon.name: Covenant through Baptism
Book of Mormon.passage: Be baptized in the name of the Lord, as a witness … that ye have entered into a covenant with him.

Book of Mormon.name: Christ's Suffering
Book of Mormon.passage: And he shall go forth, suffering pains and afflictions and temptations of every kind.

Book of Mormon.name: The Atonement
Book of Mormon.passage: There must be an atonement made, … an infinite and eternal sacrifice.

Book of Mormon.name: Avoid Lust
Book of Mormon.passage: Go no more after the lusts of your eyes.

Book of Mormon.name: Consequences of Wickedness
Book of Mormon.passage: Wickedness never was happiness.

Book of Mormon.name: Solid Foundation
Book of Mormon.passage: It is upon the rock of our Redeemer … that ye must build your foundation.

Book of Mormon.name: Christ's Submission
Book of Mormon.passage: I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

Book of Mormon.name: Striving for Perfection
Book of Mormon.passage: Be perfect even as I, or your Father who is in heaven is perfect.

Book of Mormon.name: Coming Unto Christ
Book of Mormon.passage: Come unto me and be baptized … that ye may be sanctified by the reception of the Holy Ghost.

Book of Mormon.name: Trial of Faith
Book of Mormon.passage: Ye receive no witness until after the trial of your faith.

Book of Mormon.name: Strength in Weakness
Book of Mormon.passage: If men come unto me … then will I make weak things become strong unto them.

Book of Mormon.name: Charity
Book of Mormon.passage: Charity is the pure love of Christ.

Book of Mormon.name: Seeking Truth Through Prayer
Book of Mormon.passage: Ask with a sincere heart, with real intent, having faith in Christ … [and] by the power of the Holy Ghost ye may know the truth of all things.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: The First Vision
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: saw two Personages, whose brightness and glory defy all description.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: True and Living Church
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The only true and living church.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Voice of the Lord
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: Whether by mine own voice or by the voice of my servants, it is the same.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Trust in Christ
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: Look unto me in every thought; doubt not, fear not.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Revelation through the Holy Ghost
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: I will tell you in your mind and in your heart, by the Holy Ghost.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Aaronic Priesthood
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The Aaronic Priesthood holds the keys of the ministering of angels, and of the gospel of repentance, and of baptism.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Worth of Souls
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The worth of souls is great in the sight of God.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Joy in Bringing Souls
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: How great will be your joy if you should bring many souls unto me!

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Christ's Atonement
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: I, [Jesus Christ], have suffered these things for all.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Receiving the Prophet’s Words
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The prophet’s word ye shall receive, as if from mine own mouth.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Second Coming
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: I will reveal myself from heaven with power and great glory … and dwell in righteousness with men on earth a thousand years.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Marriage Ordained
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: Marriage is ordained of God.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Repentance and Forgiveness
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: He who has repented of his sins, the same is forgiven.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Requirement to Forgive
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: Of you it is required to forgive all men.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Creator and Savior
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: By [Jesus Christ] the worlds are and were created.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Obedience Binds the Lord
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: I, the Lord, am bound when ye do what I say.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Power of Godliness
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: In the ordinances thereof, the power of godliness is manifest.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Seek Learning
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: Seek learning, even by study and also by faith.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Word of Wisdom
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The blessings of the Word of Wisdom.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Melchizedek Priesthood
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The Melchizedek Priesthood … has power and authority … to administer in spiritual things.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Rights of the Priesthood
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The rights of the priesthood … cannot be controlled nor handled only on the principles of righteousness.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Nature of God
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The Father has a body of flesh and bones … ; the Son also; but the Holy Ghost … is a personage of Spirit.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Eternal Marriage
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: The new and everlasting covenant of marriage.

Doctrine And Covenants.name: Joseph Smith and Book of Mormon
Doctrine And Covenants.passage: Joseph Smith brought forth the Book of Mormon, which he translated by the gift and power of God.
